notes.note: **UI Enhancements:** Enjoy a cleaner, more refined look with layout improvements and bug fixes.
**On-device translations:** Read full web pages in your language and keep your content private.
**Stability updates:** Performance improvements for better user experience.

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - iOS 15
 - iOS 16
 - iOS 17
 - iOS 18
 - iOS 26
text:
Thanks for using Firefox! Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you at [iOS Support][1].


  [1]: https://mzl.la/iOSSupport
title: Firefox for iOS 146.0 Release
